title: Geology of the 1/4° field sheets nos. 101, 102, 103, 104, Akuse
series: Archive report / Ghana Geological Survey Department -- no. 23, 2nd ed.

notes.value:
"Incorporating results of field mapping in field sheet no. 48 by R.H. Fakundiny and B.K. Pentsil."

The authors wrote the report in 1966 but was unpublished.

Description based on: v. 2, published in 2003.

Includes bibliographical references (p. 126-133).

contributions: Ghana Geological Survey. Archives Rehabilitation Unit.
